ygData.subject: Good session
ygData.msgSnippet: I popped into SK to try to pick up a few plat on gnolls or aviaks, but intercepted a call for a named char location. I got it on track and responded. I lead a
ygData.messageBody:
I popped into SK to try to pick up a few plat on gnolls or aviaks,
but intercepted a call for a named char location. I got it on track
and responded. I lead a group hunting a rare drop to their quarry,
and made 50pp plus in tips. Took maybe five minutes.

A short time later I am in the tunnel mouth of ec to sell some of the
loot given as tips, when a player asked for a port. Having done very
well I felt generous, so did a free port to bb. In bb I got a call
for a wc port, party of two. Did the job. 100pp tip. Not bad at all.
My most profitable session yet. It was quite fun.

Barto Proudfoot
